Robot

Class USLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Robot.USLocalizer

  • public class USLocalizer
extends Object
    This class accomplishes the task of Localization using an ultrasonic sensor.

    It is responsible for using ultrasonic readings to determine where absolute 0 degrees is relative to the board.

    Most of the variables are private. It uses many public variables from Main. The methods are private and non-static.
    Author:
    Thomas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double angleA
      The angle at which we find the first wall when we do not see a wall and then rotate counterclockwise (in radians).
      private double angleB
      The angle at which we find the second wall (in radians).
      private double distanceToWall
      Stores the ultrasonic reading which we will say is the distance to the nearest wall (in cm).
      private static EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor
      The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the left motor.
      private Odometer odo
      The Odometer object that we use to access x, y, and theta values.
      private double[] pos
      An array to store position data from odometer
      private static EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor
      The EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object for the right motor.
      static double ROTATION_SPEED
      The rotation speed of the motors (in deg/s) for localization.
      private static int sleepperiod
      Sleep period of the localization loop.
      static double TRACK
      Track or width of the robot.
      private float[] usData
      Buffer array to store data from the ultrasonic sensor (in m).
      private SampleProvider usSensor
      Buffer sampleProvider that can fetch samples from the ultrasonic sensor.
      private static int WALL_DISTANCE
      Stores a distance where we say that we see a wall (in cm).
      static double WHEEL_RADIUS
      Radius of wheels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • USLocalizer

        public USLocalizer()
        Constructor for USLocalizer class. Takes no inputs but inherits many variables from Main.

    • Method Detail

      • doLocalization

        public void doLocalization()
        The method does falling edge localization. The angles (as reported by the odometer) at which we detect the walls are used to figure out an absolute heading. 0 is in the positive x axis.

      • rotateClockwise

        private void rotateClockwise()
        Rotates the robot clockwise. The rotation speed of the wheels are ROTATION_SPEED (in deg/s).

      • turn

        private void turn(double angle)
        Turns the robot a certain degrees counterclockwise.
        Parameters:
        angle - Counter-clockwise angle that the robot will turn.

      • rotateCounterClockwise

        private void rotateCounterClockwise()
        Rotates the robot counter-clockwise. The rotation speed of the wheels are ROTATION_SPEED (in deg/s).

      • convertAngle

        private static int convertAngle(double radius,
               double width,
               double angle)
        Converts a desired change in robot's heading (in radians) into how much linear distance a wheel needs to travel (in cm).
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the wheel (in cm).
        width - The track or width of the robot (in cm).
        angle - The angle you want the robot to turn (in degrees).
        Returns:
        The linear distance that a wheel would have to rotate.

      • convertDistance

        private static int convertDistance(double radius,
                  double distance)
        Converts linear distance that you want a wheel to rotate into a value that stores the rotations (in degrees) that the wheel needs to rotate.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the wheel.
        distance - The distance you want a wheel to rotate.
        Returns:
        An int that stores the rotation (in degrees) that a wheel needs to rotate.

      • getFilteredData

        private float getFilteredData()
        Gets the most recent ultrasonic sensor value.
        Returns:
        A float that stores the ultrasonic reading (in cm). If the value is more than WALL_DISTANCE, set it to WALL_DISTANCE (ceiling filter).
